entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening then northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
